description.value:
Voice of the Jackal
Punishment Rite (Level 2) • Caern

Time: 30 minutes
Cost: 3 Gnosis
Target: One creature capable of speech

Description

The Voice of the Jackal is a rite of humiliation and enforced honesty. Spirits of mockery and revelation cling to the offender, twisting their words and undermining their dignity.

Effect

If the target fails their saving throw, for the next 24 hours:

  • The target has disadvantage on Charisma-based ability checks
  • When speaking in social situations, the Storyteller may compel: awkward honesty; socially inappropriate admissions; embarrassing but non-damaging statements

This Rite cannot force the revelation of:

  • Magical secrets
  • Plot-critical information
  • Player-controlled backstory details without consent

Resisting a Punishment Rite

If this rite targets an unwilling creature, the target may attempt to resist. The target makes a Wisdom saving throw. Save DC = 8 + the performing Garou's Max Gnosis Rating. On a success, the Rite fails and has no effect (the Gnosis cost is still spent). On a failure, the Rite takes full effect. Willing targets do not make a saving throw.
